Package edu.umn.se.trap.rules.business

Class Summary
AddOtherExpenses Add all other expenses to the reimbursement total.
AddTransportationExpenses This rule adds all transportation expenses not covered elsewhere.
AlcoholOnlyAllowedUnderNonSponsored This class checks that any alcohol related expenses that are claimed have available non-sponsored grants to charge.
AlcoholOnlyFundedByNonSponsoredGrantTest This class tests the alcohol requirement 3.d.
BaggageExpenses Add all baggage expenses to the total.
BusinessLogicRule Abstract class representing a business rule.
DoDForeignExpenseRestriction Checks that any foreign expenses are fundable under non DoD sources.
DoDForeignExpenseRestrictionTest This class tests requirement 3.i.
DoDMealRestrictions This rule checks all the requirements of being reimbursed under a DoD grant.
DoDMealRestrictionsTest This class checks that DoD grants do not reimburse for breakfast expenses
DomesticCarRental Checks that all domestic transportation expenses for rental cars use an accepted carrier.
DomesticCarRentalTest TODO: Requirement
FamilyMemberExpensesNotAllowed Checks all incidental and other expense justifications for any mention of family.
FamilyMemberExpensesNotAllowedTest  
FindDestinations Finds all destinations in the application and adds them to the output.
ForeignGrantsNoDomesticTravel Foreign grants are not allowed to pay for domestic travel within the United States.
ForeignGrantsNoDomesticTravelTest This class tests that foreign grants do not pay for domestic things, as per requirement 3.g
GrantApproverName This rule checks that grant output fields have the grant approver name set.
GrantApproverNameTest This class fulfills requirement 3.c, that the user's name is not printed out if the user is the grant approver.
IncidentalPerDiem Add all incidental expenses to the total according to their per diem amount.
IncidentalsPerDiemTest A set of tests for requirements 2.d and 2.n involving incidental expense per diems.
InternetOnlyUnderNonSponsoredGrant Checks that a user only appropriately claims internet expenses.
InternetOnlyUnderNonSponsoredGrants This class checks that any internet related expenses that are claimed have available non-sponsored grants to charge.
LodgingPerDiem Add all lodging expenses to the total according to their per diem amount.
LodgingPerDiemTest  
MealPerDiem Add all meal expenses to the total according to their per diem amount.
MealPerDiemTest Check for requirement 2.c and 2.m
NIHGrantRestrictions This rule checks all the requirements of the NIH grants.
NIHGrantRestrictionsTest Class checks that the NIH restrictions are met.
NoExportGrantsOnlyForUSCitizens NoExport grants can only be used by users who are United States citizens
NoExportGrantsOnlyForUSCitizensTest Checks that no-export grants are only used by US citizens.
OnlyOneCheckedLuggage This rule checks that there are no more baggage expense claims than the number of flights.
OnlyOneCheckedLuggageTest TODO: Requirement
PerDayCarExpenses This rule checks that there are no personal and rental car expenses claimed on the same day.
PerDayCarExpensesTest  
TransportationMileageExpenses Adds transportation expenses involving car mileage.
TransportationMileageExpensesTest  
USCarriersOnly Check that all air travel expenses are with a US based carrier.
USCarriersOnlyTest
